data.message: Was worth the wait...I love it been listening to it all day on re rewind.... YelaWolf just gets better and better its #eargasm...Now Im eagerly waiting for Eminem s new album to drop... <3 would have loved a colab of Eminem and YelaWolf on this...

replies.message: Thank you for actually commenting on Yela's album - came to the comments hoping to hear what people think of the album and just got so much junk in the comments, this was the first real comment I have come across... I'll deffo have to give the album a go!

Suzan Pandora Boylan I`m a big Yela fan...just had it blasting in my car just now...Im on Cloud 9 lol ...Ur gonna love it...the last 3 Yela songs on my wall are of his new album u can go on my wall n check them out....
Hes previously done a collab with Yela
Gary Wivell Yes Best Friend and Twisted hes done a few more also...there always good...hopefully Em will have a new one on his album...
Finally someone commenting on Yelawolf, seriously!
